description:
Smooth rolling wheels that are a great choice for your commuter bike. Whether you are building a bike for urban adventures, or are gravel curious, the Evo Tour 16 will get you rolling and are ready for years of service.

  • 6061 aluminum rims are light and strong
  • Double wall rim construction adds rigidity for improved handling
  • Assembled in North America by experienced wheel builders with Sapim 14G stainless steel spokes and 14mm brass Polyax nipples
  • Designed for use with 11-speed drivetrains, 10-speed drivetrains are possible but require a 1.85mm spacer (not included)
  • Quick-release axles included
  • Inner width: 16.6mm
  • Profile height: 27mm
name: Wheel Shop Evo Tour 16 700C Wheels
